message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, let's see if you'll accept this first offer
You're being greedy, I'll take a smaller share to see if you'll accept
I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm still taking the lead
You're not being generous enough, I'll take a tiny share to see if you'll finally give in
I'm not backing down, you'll have to make a better offer
I'm not giving up, I'll take a tiny share and hope you'll finally accept
I'm not budging, you'll have to make a serious offer
I'll take a tiny share, but I'm not giving up yet
I'm taking the last bit, you've had your chance
I'm not accepting your last-minute attempt to take everything, I'll take nothing and hope you'll regret it
